required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase II Study of Anlotinib in Patients With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer（ALTER0302）
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter, Phase II Study of Anlotinib(AL3818) as Third Line Treatment in Patients With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer（ALTER0302）

brief_summary.textblock: Anlotibib (AL3818) is a kind of innovative medicines approved by State Food and Drug Administration（SFDA:2011L00661） which was researched by Jiangsu Chia-tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. Anlotinib is a kinase inhibitor of receptor tyrosine with multi-targets, especially for VEGFR2、VEGFR3、PDGFRβ and c-Kit. It has the obvious resistance to new angiogenesis. The trial is to explore Anlotinib for the effectiveness and safety of andvanced non-small cell lung cancer who failed two lines of chemotherapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: each 42 days up to disease progression
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of Anlotinib Hydrochloric Capsule by enhanced CT/MRI scan every two cycles. Refer to recist 1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: each 21 days up to intolerance the toxicity(or PD)
secondary_outcome.description: contain Serious Adverse Event To evaluate the safety of Anlotinib by CTC AE 4.0

arm_group.description: Anlotinib QD po and it should be continued until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent
Placebo capsule QD po and it should be continued until disease progression or patients withdrawal of consent

overall_official.affiliation: Chest hospital affiliated to Shanghai jiaotong university

facility.name: Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
Xinqiao Hospital, Third Military Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Suzhou University
Chest hospital affiliated to Shanghai jiaotong university
